pages.title: Spectrum Enchanting
pages.text: Using the Enchanter to enchant items is fairly easy:$(br)Place Enchanted Books, onto the $(l:decoration/item_bowl)Item Bowls$(/l) and the item you want to enchant on the Enchanter itself.$(br2)Unlike regular enchanting, this will not consume the books - but will require a far greater amount of experience instead.
Supply a steady stream of experience via $(l:magical_items/knowledge_drop)Knowledge Drop$(/l) and you are set.
